results.title: BP Fluctuations and the Real-Time Dynamics of Renal Blood Flow Responses in Conscious Rats.
results.text_hl: However, in @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ with severe @<m>DISEASE_Glycosuria_Renal</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006030 @@@renal autoregulation@@@ impairment (3/4 nephrectomy plus @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@), @<m>DISEASE_Glycosuria_Renal</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006030 @@@renal@@@ blood flow in conscious animals (but not anesthetized animals) was still restored to baseline, but took longer (15-20 seconds).

citations.NLM: Bidani AK, Polichnowski AJ, Licea-Vargas H, Long J, Kliethermes S, Williamson GA, Griffin KA. BP Fluctuations and the Real-Time Dynamics of Renal Blood Flow Responses in Conscious Rats. J Am Soc Nephrol. 2020 Feb;31(2):324-336. PMID: 31792155
citations.BibTeX: @article{31792155, title={BP Fluctuations and the Real-Time Dynamics of Renal Blood Flow Responses in Conscious Rats.}, author={Bidani AK and Polichnowski AJ and Licea-Vargas H and Long J and Kliethermes S and Williamson GA and Griffin KA}, journal={J Am Soc Nephrol}, volume={31}, number={2}, pages={324-336}}

results.title: Low protein diet mediated renoprotection in remnant kidneys: Renal autoregulatory versus hypertrophic mechanisms.
results.text_hl: METHODS: @SPECIES_10116 @@@Rats@@@ with 5/6 @<m>DISEASE_Glycosuria_Renal</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006030 @@@renal@@@ ablation received either a 25% standard protein diet, an 8% low protein diet and a low protein diet with either @CHEMICAL_Verapamil @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014700 @@@verapamil@@@ or @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@.

citations.NLM: Griffin KA, Picken M, Giobbie-Hurder A, Bidani AK. Low protein diet mediated renoprotection in remnant kidneys: Renal autoregulatory versus hypertrophic mechanisms. Kidney Int. 2003 Feb;63(2):607-16. PMID: 12631125
citations.BibTeX: @article{12631125, title={Low protein diet mediated renoprotection in remnant kidneys: Renal autoregulatory versus hypertrophic mechanisms.}, author={Griffin KA and Picken M and Giobbie-Hurder A and Bidani AK}, journal={Kidney Int}, volume={63}, number={2}, pages={607-16}}

results.title: Exforge  (amlodipine/valsartan combination) in hypertension: the evidence of its therapeutic impact
results.text_hl: No data exist to prove that the @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@/@CHEMICAL_Valsartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068756 @@@valsartan@@@ combination is better than other antihypertensive strategies for cardiovascular or @<m>DISEASE_Glycosuria_Renal</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006030 @@@renal@@@ protection, but some trials with other combination therapies show such potential advantage.

citations.NLM: Krzesinski JM, Cohen EP. Exforge  (amlodipine/valsartan combination) in hypertension: the evidence of its therapeutic impact Core Evid. 2010 Jun 15;4():1-11. PMID: 20694060
citations.BibTeX: @article{20694060, title={Exforge  (amlodipine/valsartan combination) in hypertension: the evidence of its therapeutic impact}, author={Krzesinski JM and Cohen EP}, journal={Core Evid}, volume={4}, pages={1-11}}

results.title: Transient prehypertensive treatment in spontaneously hypertensive rats: a comparison of losartan and amlodipine regarding long-term blood pressure, cardiac and renal protection.
results.text_hl: Transient prehypertensive treatment in spontaneously @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@: a comparison of @CHEMICAL_Losartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019808 @@@losartan@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ regarding long-term blood pressure, cardiac @<m>DISEASE_Glycosuria_Renal</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006030 @@@and renal@@@ protection.

citations.NLM: Peng F, Lin J, Lin L, Tang H. Transient prehypertensive treatment in spontaneously hypertensive rats: a comparison of losartan and amlodipine regarding long-term blood pressure, cardiac and renal protection. Int J Mol Med. 2012 Dec;30(6):1376-86. PMID: 23064712

results.title: Hypertension after renal transplantation. Calcium channel or converting enzyme blockade?
results.text_hl: Compared with placebo, @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ treatment was associated with a significant increase in glomerular filtration rate (10 +/- 20%, P < .05) and effective renal plasma flow (27 +/- 20%, P < .01) and a decrease in @<m>DISEASE_Glycosuria_Renal</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006030 @@@renal vascular@@@ resistance (23 +/- 18%, P < .01).

citations.NLM: van der Schaaf MR, Hené RJ, Floor M, Blankestijn PJ, Koomans HA. Hypertension after renal transplantation. Calcium channel or converting enzyme blockade? Hypertension. 1995 Jan;25(1):77-81. PMID: 7843758
citations.BibTeX: @article{7843758, title={Hypertension after renal transplantation. Calcium channel or converting enzyme blockade?}, author={van der Schaaf MR and Hené RJ and Floor M and Blankestijn PJ and Koomans HA}, journal={Hypertension}, volume={25}, number={1}, pages={77-81}}

results.title: Effect of amlodipine on renin secretion and renin gene expression in rats.
results.text_hl: To this end we studied the effects of the @CHEMICAL_1_4_dihydropyridine @CHEMICAL_MESH:C038806 @@@1,4-dihydropyridine@@@ derivative, @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@, on plasma @GENE_REN @GENE_24715 @@@renin@@@ activity and renal @GENE_REN @GENE_24715 @@@renin@@@ m-RNA levels in normal @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ and @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ with unilateral @<m>DISEASE_Glycosuria_Renal</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006030 @@@renal hypoperfusion@@@ induced by applying 0.2 mm left renal artery clips over four days. 2.

citations.NLM: Schricker K, Hamann M, Macher A, Krämer BK, Kaissling B, Kurtz A. Effect of amlodipine on renin secretion and renin gene expression in rats. Br J Pharmacol. 1996 Oct;119(4):744-50. PMID: 8904650

results.title: L/N-type calcium channel blocker cilnidipine ameliorates proteinuria and inhibits the renal renin-angiotensin-aldosterone system in deoxycorticosterone acetate-salt hypertensive rats.
results.text_hl: Although neither @CHEMICAL_cilnidipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:C065927 @@@cilnidipine@@@ nor @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ had any effect on the increased blood pressure in the @CHEMICAL_Desoxycorticosterone_Acetate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D064791 @@@DOCA@@@-salt group, these @<m>DISEASE_Glycosuria_Renal</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006030 @@@renal changes@@@ were not induced by treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@.

citations.NLM: Toba H, Yoshida M, Tojo C, Nakano A, Oshima Y, Kojima Y, Noda K, Wang J, Kobara M, Nakata T. L/N-type calcium channel blocker cilnidipine ameliorates proteinuria and inhibits the renal renin-angiotensin-aldosterone system in deoxycorticosterone acetate-salt hypertensive rats. Hypertens Res. 2011 Apr;34(4):521-9. PMID: 21270815

results.title: Angiotensin blockade to reduce microvascular damage in diabetes mellitus.
results.text_hl: In the IDNT study, @GENE_AGT @GENE_183 @@@angiotensin II@@@ blockade with @CHEMICAL_Irbesartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077405 @@@irbesartan@@@ was found to lead to an absolute reduction of @<m>DISEASE_Glycosuria_Renal</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006030 @@@renal@@@ events by 7.4% as compared to standard treatment, and by 9.5% as compared to @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@.

citations.NLM: Schmieder RE, Martin S, Lang GE, Bramlage P, Böhm M. Angiotensin blockade to reduce microvascular damage in diabetes mellitus. Dtsch Arztebl Int. 2009 Aug;106(34-35):556-62. PMID: 19795011
